lines.text: I am the head administrator. I have given you the expressed responsibility to burn to the ground this cursed house.
Yes, padre. Raze it that not a stick is left of the house of Escodera. Not so much as a stick. That is my last will and testament, Don Julio.
That's the truth, Padre. Believe me. Believe me.
Please tell me the rest of it.
[Whispers something inaudible to the Padre that makes him look up in fear]
If that is your decision, then I will obey, Papa. But, I'm also an Escodero! And nothing can make me change my feelings.
She's dead, Leonore. What you're seeing is just a shell. It moves and cries only through the power of... Satan.
Eduardo shall rule you from now on! I, Eduardo, am your lord and your only master. I am your life!
Daniel, don't! You mustn't stain your hands with the blood of an Escodera. It will accomplish nothing.
Have you taken leave of your senses? I'm your sister!
